EmailTemplate.name: Send Demand Letter to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Demand Letter - {!Booking__c.Project_Name_Formulla__c} {!Booking__c.Unit_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Customer},
Please find the attachment of Demand Letter for your booking of Project {!Project} and Unit No. {!Unit}.
Thank You, Dynamix Group
